meanings.definition: A building on a college campus where students live.
meanings.sent1: The dorm is where many students stay during the school year.
meanings.sent2: I walked past the dorm every day on my way to class.
meanings.sent3: The dorm was so crowded that it felt like a big sleepover party.
meanings.sent4: The dorm, with its buzzing activity, was like a beehive of student life.
meanings.sent5: The dorm, with its white walls and green roof, stood out among the other campus buildings.

meanings.definition: A room in a dormitory where a student sleeps.
meanings.sent1: My dorm has a small window that lets in the morning sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She decorated her dorm with fairy lights and posters.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked into the wrong dorm and startled a sleeping student.
meanings.sent4: The dorm felt like a cozy cave, shielding me from the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The dorm, with its soft bed and warm blankets, was a haven after a long day of classes.
